contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 2, 1961 D Edinburgh International Contest
Edinburgh International Contest 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
edinburgh-international-contest
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Princes Street Gardens, Edinburgh March contest - 1st Crossley Carpets, 2nd Carlton Main, 3rd Scottish C.W.S. Hymn tune contest - Tullis Russell, 2nd Scottish C.W.S., 3rd Scottish Gas Board. 13th Invitation Contest. 10 bands competed.
Feb. 6, 2011, 8:15 p.m. April 15, 2014, 10:57 a.m.
1 Cooperation Band Alex Mortimer An Epic Symphony
2 Carlton Main Frickley Colliery Band Jack Atherton The Frogs of Aristophanes
3 Crossley's Carpet Works John Harrison Life Divine
4 Tullis Russell Mills Drake Rimmer The Frogs of Aristophanes
5 Bellshill & District Concert Brass Dugald MacBrayne Le Roi d'Ys
6 Yorkshire Imperial Brass Band George Hespe The Three Musketeers
7 Hawick Saxhorn Band James Amos Rhapsody in Brass
7 Unison Kinneil Band John Kirkwood Life Divine
9 Eccles Borough Band Edward Buttress Oliver Cromwell
10 Wallsend Shipyard George Lee Les Preludes [arr. Rimmer]
